entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
